item.title: How To Create This Beautiful Blog - (It Is Free!)
item.description:
This article explains how to create this beautiful blog with the static site generator Hugo, the theme Blowfish, GitHub for storage, Giscus for comments, and Cloudflare for hosting. And the best thing: it doesn’t cost you a penny!

My Blog Journey
#

I’m blogging for more than 15 years now. During that time, I tested and used different blogging technologies and products. I started with a hosted service. While writing was okay, it lacked flexibility and personalization possibilities. I then moved to a self-hosted WordPress installation, which solved these problems. But, WordPress was slow, maintenance intensive, and I had to pay and maintain a virtual private server which was idling the majority of the time.
